title: Abakɔsɛm Tiatiaa a Ɛfa Adwinni Ho wɔ Ahunmu - Orbital Temple
heading: Adwinni a Ɛwɔ Ahunmu Ho Abakɔsɛm Tiatiaa
intro: Efi bere a wodii kan tow satellite a wɔde nsa ayɛ a edii nkonim wɔ 1957 mu no, satellite bɛboro mpem du aba atwa Asase ho ahyia. Wɔ saa bere foforo yi mu no, adwumfo anya ɔkwan bi a wɔbɛfa so atrɛw wɔn adeyɛ mu na ahunmu abɛyɛ ntama foforo. Ɛno akyi no, nsemmisa titire a ɛfa ahunmu nhwehwɛmu amammuisɛm ho asɔre - ɛwom sɛ wonnya nkata asase pii so de.

leonov.text: Adwinni a edi kan a wɔyɛe wɔ ahunmu ne mfonini a ɛkyerɛ owia apuei wɔ Asase so, a Russiani ahunmu kwankyerɛfo Alexei Leonov yɛe bere a na ɔwɔ Voskhod 2 mu wɔ 1965 mu no .
leonov.caption: Adwinni a edi kan a wɔyɛe wɔ ahunmu, ne pɛnsere a Alexei Leonov de yɛɛ ho mfonini. Mfonini: Yuri Gagarin Ahunmu Akwantufo Nteteebea Tete Nneɛma Akorae

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Mfe abiɛsa akyi no, Ɔsram Tete Nneɛma Akorae , dɔte mprɛte ketewaa bi a wɔkyerɛ sɛ ɛbaa Ɔsram no so a mfoniniyɛfo a wɔagye din sen biara wɔ U.S. saa bere no mu baanum nkyerɛwee wɔ so: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers ne Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Ɔsram Tete Nneɛma Akorae no mfonini a efi New York Times asɛm a edi kan no mu. Nsateaa no kata Warhol mfonini no so.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Warhol mmoa a ɛkanyan akɔnnɔ - benkum so atifi - maa saa adwuma yi yɛɛ asɛnnennen maa nkitahodi nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔfo saa bere no.
moonMuseum.caption2: Mfonini a New York Times paw sɛ wobetintim, a wotumi hu adwinni no wɔ ase hɔ na Andy Warhol mfonini no wɔ benkum so atifi.

fallenAstronaut.text: Wɔ 1971 mu no , wɔde aluminium ohoni ketewaa bi a ɛte sɛ onipa a wɔfrɛ no Fallen Astronaut sii Ɔsram no so denam Apollo 15 ahunmu kwankyerɛfo David Scott so . Belgiumni mfoniniyɛfo Paul Van Hoeydonck yɛɛ n’adwene sɛ, ɔde saa asɛm yi bɛkae ahunmu akwantufo ne ahunmu akwantufo a wɔawuwu wɔ ahunmu nhwehwɛmu nkɔso mu no.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Nkaedi abopon a wogyaw wɔ ɔsram so wɔ Hadley-Apennine beae a wɔde wɔn si fam no a wohu.

pioneerVoyager.text: Wɔ 1970 mfe no mu no, Pioneer Plaques ne Voyager Probes nyinaa hyehyɛɛ adwinni ho nimdeɛ foforo wɔ ahunmu. Bere a wɔde aluminium abopon a wɔde sika kɔkɔɔ ayɛ a wɔde nkrasɛm a wotumi hu a efi Asase so kɔma ahunmu akwantufo foforo biara a ebia wobehu no daakye akyirikyiri no, wɔyɛɛ nnipa asetra ho mfonini wɔ ne nneɛma atitiriw sen biara mu.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Pioneer 10 ne 11 abopon, a wɔde kɔɔ ahunmu a emu dɔ wɔ 1970 mfe no mu.

dove.text: Wɔ 1990 mu no, Brazil gyaw n’agyiraehyɛde wɔ asasesin yi mu denam DOVE/OSCAR-17 , satellite a ɛyɛ anifere a ɛyɛ amateur a ɛwɔ anwensɛm tumi kɛse so. Ɛwom sɛ ne bɔfo no ammu ne ho sɛ mfoniniyɛfo de, nanso na ɛyɛ anwensɛm mu mmɔdenbɔ a emu dɔ: ɛkyeree mmofra nne a wɔsrɛɛ asomdwoe na ɛde kɔmaa radio so animdefo bɛboro mpem abien wɔ wiase nyinaa, na ɛdanee CubeSat akwampaefo bi yɛɛ no nnyigyei adwuma a wɔbom yɛ.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, Brazil anwensɛm satellite a ɛde mmofra nne mena de hwehwɛ asomdwoe, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Wɔ afe 2012 mu no, mfoniniyɛfo Trevor Paglen de "The Last Pictures" , micro-etched disc a mfonini 100 a wɔde abata Echostar XVI nkitahodi satellite ho wɔ geostationary orbit mu no too gua. Wɔayɛ no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛbɛtra hɔ mfe ɔpepepem pii, na wɔayɛ sɛ ɛbɛtra hɔ akyɛ asen nnipa anibuei sɛ fam tutu mu ade a wɔde bɛyɛ daakye akyirikyiri.
lastPictures.caption: The Last Pictures, diski a wɔayɛ no micro-etched a wɔayɛ sɛ ɛbɛtra hɔ akyɛ asen adesamma, fii ase wɔ afe 2012 mu.

ulises.text: Wɔ afe 2015 mu no, Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) de Ulises I , nanosatellite a wɔsusuu ho sɛ adwene mu opera wɔ adwumfoɔ Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús akwankyerɛ ase. Wɔde satellite no kɔɔ stratosphere wɔ balloon so wɔ Feria del Libro de Guadalajara bere mu. Wɔayɛ no sɛ ɛbɛpae bɛyɛ nnɔnhwerew anan na wɔde parachute asian.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, satellite opera a wɔde adwene ayɛ a Colectivo Espacial Mexicano yɛe.

artsat.text: Ɛyɛ afe 2014 mu ansa na wɔtow satellite a edi kan a ɛyɛ adwinni ara kwa no. Tokyo Sukuupɔn ARTSAT-1 Invader adwuma no de ahunmu nsɛm kɔmaa Asase a wɔde dii dwuma wɔ adwinni a wɔde si hɔ ne nnwom a wɔbɔ mu.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader framework ne spare parts a ɛkaa Asase so.
artsat.caption2: asɛmpatrɛw [SPACE x ART] − beyond Cosmologies ɔyɛkyerɛ a wɔyɛe wɔ Tete Nneɛma Akorae a Ɛhwɛ Nnɛyi Adwinni So Tokyo

kac.text: Brazilni ne Amerikani nnɛyi mfoniniyɛfo Eduardo Kac aboa ahunmu adwinni denam adwuma a ɔne NASA ne SpaceX ayɛ so . Ne "Inner Telescope" ( 2017 ), a ɔne Franseni ahunmu kwankyerɛfo Thomas Pesquet yɛe no, ɛde ohoni bi a wɔyɛe wɔ International Space Station .
kac.caption: Inner Telescope a ɛwɔ Amanaman Ntam Ahunmu Dwumadibea, a wɔne Franseni ahunmu kwankyerɛfo Thomas Pesquet na ɛyɛe, afe 2017.

enoch.text: Wɔ afe 2018 mu no, wɔde CubeSat a ɛnyɛ adwuma a wɔsii sɛ adwinni adwuma no sii hɔ kɔɔ orbit. Bahamani adwene ho mfoniniyɛfo Tavares Strachan na ɔyɛɛ Henoch , na sika kɔkɔɔ toa bi a ne kɛse yɛ karat 24 a ɛwɔ ahunmu kwankyerɛfo a odi kan a ɔyɛ Afrikani-Amerikani, Robert Henry Lawrence Kumaa , anim mfonini wom.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (adekyerɛ a wɔde kyerɛ), 2015-2017. l Tavares Strachan, mfonini l Tete Nneɛma Akorae Mfɛfo/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Saa afe no ara mu no, wɔde Trevor Paglen Orbital Reflector nso sii hɔ sɛ ohoni a wɔde ahyɛ CubeSat a ɛnyɛ adwuma mu. Ná adwuma no yɛ adwinni mu adeyɛ a na wɔayɛ sɛ wɔde bɛsakra ɔkwan a yehu yɛn gyinabea wɔ wiase no mu. Wɔamfa anni dwuma yiye. Ɛwom sɛ wɔanbue da sɛnea wɔhyehyɛɛ no de, nanso ɛkanyan nkɔmmɔbɔ a ɛho hia na ɛmaa nsoromma ho animdefo, nyansahufo, nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔfo, akyerɛkyerɛfo, sukuufo, ne ɔmanfo nyinaa nyaa mmuae a emu yɛ den fii wiase nyinaa hɔ, na ɛkyerɛe sɛ ɛho nhia sɛ adwinni a edi mu di yiye wɔ mfiridwuma mu.
orbitalReflector.caption: Digital Nkyerɛaseɛ a ɛfa Orbital Reflector ho, 2018

others.text: Mfoniniyɛfo afoforo pii aboa ahunmu adwinni, na wɔn mu biara de adwene soronko aba wɔn nhwehwɛmu no mu. Nnwuma a ɛda nsow ne Sarah Jane Pell ahunmu kwankyerɛfo mfoniniyɛfo nhwehwɛmu a ɔhwehwɛɛ nnipa dwumadi mu wɔ mmeae a ɛyɛ hu; Agnes Meyer-Brandis Moon Goose Analogue adwuma a ɛhwehwɛ abakɔsɛm ne nnɛyi ahunmu nhwehwɛmu ho nsɛm mu; Nahum AstroArts nhyehyɛe a ɛma adwinni mu microgravity sɔhwɛ ahorow yɛ mmerɛw; ne Arthur Woods Cosmic Dancer ohoni, ohoni a edi kan a wɔde kyerɛe wɔ ahunmu wɔ Mir gyinabea hɔ wɔ 1993 mu.

orbitalTemple.text: Wɔ afe 2025 mu , mfeɛ 4 nhwehwɛmu ne nkɔsoɔ akyi no, Brazilni adwumfoɔ Edson Pavoni ne kuw bi a wɔyɛ adwuma bom a wɔyɛ adwuma ahodoɔ bɛto Orbital Temple , adwini satellite a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu a ɛto nsa frɛ obiara wɔ wiase sɛ ɔmfa din nkɔ orbit, na ayɛ nkaeɛ a ɛka obiara ho koraa a ɛboro ahyeɛ so.
orbitalTemple.caption: Orbital Asɔredan a ɛwɔ Mercosul Bienal no. Mfonini no: Clara Marques

imageAlts.moonMuseum: Ɔsram Tete Nneɛma Akorae a wɔde dɔte ayɛ
imageAlts.moonMuseumWarhol: Moon Museum ceramic wafer a ɛkyerɛ adwinni nyinaa
imageAlts.fallenAstronaut: Ahunmu kwankyerɛfo a wɔahwe ase nkae ade wɔ Ɔsram no so
imageAlts.dove: WHERE/OSCAR-17 satellite a ɛwɔ hɔ no
imageAlts.lastPictures: Mfonini a Etwa To disc no
imageAlts.artsatArt: Adwini a wɔde ARTSAT-1 data ayɛ
imageAlts.innerTelescope: Eduardo Kac Afiri a Wɔde Hwɛ Nneɛma a Ɛwɔ Mu
imageAlts.enoch: Tavares Strachan ENOCH afiri a wɔde kyerɛ nneɛma
imageAlts.orbitalReflector: Trevor Paglen’s Ɔde ne nsa kyerɛɛ ne so, na ɔde ne nsa kyerɛɛ ne so
imageAlts.orbitalTemple: Orbital Asɔredan Satellite a Wɔde Di Dwuma
